data.name: KMC KM233
data.brand_intro: A brand with 30+ years of experience, and a proud member of the WheelPros family, KMC is one of the most recognizable wheel brands in the world. Their family line consists of marks like American Racing, Motegi, Asanti, and MotoMetal, and with siblings like that you know they are 100% dedicated to quality.

model_details.name: SKU
model_details.explaination: This is the CanadaWheels Item number, to help us easyly identify parts within our inventory

model_details.name: Size
model_details.explaination: This is the diameter of the wheel and the width of the wheel. Click for video.

model_details.name: PCD
model_details.explaination: This is the bolt pattern of your car, this should always match your vehicle exactly. Click for video.

model_details.name: Load index
model_details.explaination: Offset is a range. For every car there is acceptable range of offset which can be applied. Low offsets put a wheels out, high offsets pull a wheel in. Click for video.

model_details.name: Offset
model_details.explaination: This is colour or paint of the wheel.

model_details.name: Availability
model_details.explaination: Check this to see if the product is out of stock.

data.name: Satin Gunmetal
data.brand_intro: Fast Wheels is one of the best brands in Canada in terms of their quality. If you're looking for a custom tuner wheel, a direct-fit wheel, or something for your winter tires, Fast Wheels is one of our top recommendations every time. As wheel technology advances, so does Fast Wheels business practice, to move the OEM accessory and tuner wheel market forward. Their latest Flow Form technology is amazing for low-weight winter approved wheels, and they have the largest catalog of all Canadian brands.

data.name: Fast Wheels Aventure
data.brand_intro: Fast Wheels is one of the best brands in Canada in terms of their quality. If you're looking for a custom tuner wheel, a direct-fit wheel, or something for your winter tires, Fast Wheels is one of our top recommendations every time. As wheel technology advances, so does Fast Wheels business practice, to move the OEM accessory and tuner wheel market forward. Their latest Flow Form technology is amazing for low-weight winter approved wheels, and they have the largest catalog of all Canadian brands.
features: All wheels are tested to exceed JWL, VIA and SAE standards for radial fatigue, impact resistance, bending resistance, air leaking and more
Analysis and revision with Solid Works® prior to production approval
GVWR (load rating) verification for every vehicle 3D digital mapping with the aerospace approved Faro Gauge® to confirm X and Y factor clearance check
40 000+ Canadian specific vehicles measured with over 300 data points
Custom fitments drilled and milled with Mazak CNC 3-axis vertical mill
Highest standards in radial & lateral run out verification
Wheel and tire packages are laser optically balanced
The industry’s benchmark for customer support and after-sales service

warranty.main_title: 3 YEAR WARRANTY ON FULLY PAINTED FINISHES
warranty.title: WHAT IS COVERED?
content: Peeling of the clear coat, paint or chrome finish.
Wheels with a radial or lateral run-out greater than 0.020 inch/0.50mm, provided there is no evidence of impact.
Stress cracks in the wheel, provided there is no evidence of impact.
Bubbles in the paint or chrome or other blemishes in the finish of the wheel.
Improper machining of the center bore or lug holes.
